title: Syberia 3: Deluxe Edition [v 2.0] (2017)
description:
Year of release: 20 April 2017 
Languages: English, Russian, German, Brazilian (Portuguese), French, Italian

System requirements: 
Operating system : Windows 7 (64-bit) or higher 
processor : Intel Core i3 / Intel Core i5 
RAM : 4 GB 
Graphics Card : AMD R7 260X / Nvidia GTX 550 Ti @ 2 GB 
of DirectX : Version 11 
Sound card : Sound device compatible with DirectX® 11 

Game Features:
Completely new story is unlike what you've seen in the first two games, "Siberia" series.
An exciting story and a unique artistic style of Benua Sokalya.
For the first time in franchise history developers use a three-dimensional engine, offering players a new level of freedom to move through stunning landscapes and cities.
For game music meets renowned Israeli composer Inon Zur ( "Siberia 2», Fallout, Dragon Age, Prince of Persia).

Release info:
Games Version: 2.0
Do not recoded
Cut all voice except Russian, English
The game supports languages: Russian, English, German, Brazilian (Portuguese), French, Italian
Additional software (optional)
Installation time ~ 20 minutes (s)

Installation
Mount and Install
Play
